subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Welcome to the group too =) The shack hacks are an affordable sweep tuning tool. People enjoy using them as well as various other devices. There are many methods to choose from these days.

Misty


--- On Mon, 11/17/08, laurie@... <laurie@...> wrote:

> From: laurie@... <laurie@...>
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Monday, November 17, 2008, 4:05 PM
> Hi everyone,
> 
>  
> 
> I am new to this group also. I have been experimenting with
> ITC for about 6 months now, with fairly good results from a
> basic radio shack hack. I am hoping to learn more about the
> set up of other devices and maybe gain some more technical
> knowledge from this group. 
> 
> -----Original Message-----
> From: "Misty Dawn" <bulletbabea@...>
> Sent: Monday, November 17, 2008 3:32pm
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone
> 
> Hi Marie. Welcome to the group. I enjoy manual sweep tuning
> and have had some great results including direct responses
> using that method. I think when they use my name (first
> middle and last) constantly that kind of throws out the
> randomness idea most skeptics have. But usually it takes
> people hearing thier own names and info to wonder if there
> is more to it.
> 
> Misty
> 
> 
> --- On Mon, 11/17/08, marie32711 wrote:
> 
> > From: marie32711 
> > Subject: [EVP-ITC] Hello there everyone
> > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> > Date: Monday, November 17, 2008, 12:56 PM
> > Hi i am really interested in evp/itc and have been
> recording
> > for 
> > aproximately 5/6 months i currently do both normal evp
> work
> > and also 
> > radio scanning(not franks box or radio shack hacks)
> but
> > manually 
> > scanning through the channels..i have been quite
> surprised
> > by the 
> > results that i have got.
> > I have video posted on youtube(screen name mazblondie)
> and
> > it would be 
> > excellent if anyone could give there opinions.
> > I have had many different theory presented to me, from
> > imaginationto 
> > plain faking it, but i can believe that it is all down
> to
> > chance!!
> > Hope to hear from you soon.
> > Marie
